Necross/ Splattercannon:
 
the minions took the down time to fall back a little and rest.  Splattercannon dropped his beam gatling rifle, and fell to one knee, and tried to stay conscious.  Necross also fought slep, they needed to get some energon, they were getting too tired.  Necross looked up to were Hellplague and formally Blacknightmare had engaged a perticularly troublesome Maximal.  He watched as Hellplague flung him into a chasm of energon.
"One less Maximal to worry about, but another has taken his place." he said, indicating Organics.  

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
NightStrike/Rodimus/Blackfang:


Nightstrike howled with pain when the friggen granade exploded, 
somehow he was wounded by it. BlackFang ran towards Rodimus, who was 
slowly recovered 



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, aerosmith4e@c... wrote:
> *Sigh no one takes damage from a friggen grenade come on now
> 
> Crylatrons body scratched and grinded. He went over to 
Rodimus, "Im getting to old for this.." He had one sword, the other 
was broken in shards across the battlefield.He braced for another 
onslaught from the unicron wannabe's.
